metadata.name: Point of Origin #1
metadata.description:
Ordinal Inscription #37552 
About the collection:  
The first work in the Point of Origin collection, inscribed as Ordinal #37552, holds a significant position in the series. As one of the first art projects on Bitcoin, this piece serves as the proof of authenticity for the rest of the collection and is stored immutability forever on the Bitcoin blockchain, awaiting further advancements in the Ordinal space. All other works in the collection are also inscribed as Bitcoin Ordinals, with their unique Ordinals Inscription number attached to the ERC-721 token for verification. There will only ever be 28 works in this collection.  
Each token can be viewed in a dedicated Bitcoin wallet on the dashboard, and once the infrastructure for Ordinals becomes user-friendly, it will be possible to use the ETH token to claim your BTC Ordinal. This is a true dual-chain project.  
Join B3NDRAGON as we embark on a cutting edge journey to the fringes of Digital Artifact technology and discover what is possible with Point of Origin.
